## Color selection

* **Hue**: color, commonly understood (red, blue, green)
* **Lightness** or **Value**: extent to which color is light or dark
* **Saturation**: vividness of the color

## Map export and image resolution

* Raster formats: bitmap (.bmp), Tagged Image File Format (TIFF, .tif), JPEG (.jpg)

* Vector formats: encapsulated PostScript (.eps), Enhanced Metafile (.emf), Adobe Illustrator format (.ai)

* Resolution: dots per inch (dpi)
